content: दहन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [दह्-ल्यु] {@--1@} Burning, consuming by fire; <ls>Bh. 1. 71.</ls> {@--2@} Destructive, injurious. --नः {@--1@} Fire. {@--2@} A pigeon. {@--3@} The number ‘three’. {@--4@} A bad man. {@--5@} The {%Bhallātaka%} plant. {@--6@} Lead-wort. (चित्रक). {@--7@} The constellation कृत्तिका. --नं {@--1@} Burning, consuming by fire (<ab>fig.</ab> also); <ls>R. 8. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Cauterizing. {@--3@} Sour gruel.
